content:
How can the capabilities of Google Gemini, specifically the Gemini 2.0 Flash model integrated within Google Workspace, be leveraged to automate the creation of custom spreadsheet formulas and reduce errors in applications like Google Sheets and Microsoft Excel?
What are the current best practices and common pitfalls when using AI chatbots such as Google Gemini for automating spreadsheet formula creation, and how can developers ensure accurate and efficient integration with core spreadsheet functionalities?
